1.content: Your name is john, you are eighteen, and you have just found a body swapping machine in your basement. it has two pods and a computer in the middle that controls it. "wow this is going to be fun." You say as you think of the possibilities. Who will you switch with?
1.title: Awesome Discovery

choices: Other Relatives: Grandparent, Aunt, Uncle, Cousin, etc.
11.content: "I think i'll swap with one of my family members, at least that way i wont have to leave my house." You say as you walk up the stairs to see who you could swap with. Then you get an Idea. "Thats perfect ill switch with..."
11.title: Family Members

choices: Go outside and hang with the neighbors.
Go outside and hang with his circle of friends.
113.content:
Keeping yourself near to your original body would be good. You can also keep watch of it immediately when something bad happens.

The sun was near the horizon when you found the machine. As you go back up the stairs, you see your mother and father watching TV. And as you assume it to be, your brothers should be in their respective rooms doing what they do the best, playing video games. However, you don't have a fond of it. Playing outdoor sports is your main hobby, But despite the effort you do on the field, you don't seem to have gained a single pound of muscle mass. Mom said that it was in your father's genes and as eldest, I usually get the most of it.

You get up another set of stairs and rushed to your brother's bedroom. Jake was everything you could ever hope for when you were a child. Your own bedroom, scholarship from a soccer sponsorship and your very own gadgets. Back then, your family was bankrupt and when Timmy was born and we're an edge away from living in the streets. But dad got his job back and got promoted to a chief of some production company.

"Jake, can I talk to you for a second." You said. He grabbed his headset and made me repeat my words.
"Yeah sure." He got off his bed and paused his game.
"There is something I want to show you. Follow me on the basement."

You went back down with your brother. Once down, you could just feel the awe in your brother's face.
"What is this thing?" He asked.

"A body swapper I guess. I never tried it yet and it would be wise to choose you." You said.
"Why do you want my body?"

"Well, you're close and I could check on your status easily. Also when I'm tired of being you, I could just switch us back."

"Do you really think this will work? What if it explodes or something? The kettle mess I've done yesterday is punishing enough."

"There's one way to find out if it really does work. Go on pod B and I'll go on pod C"

Both of you went to your respective pods and activated it. You wished subconsciously for this thing to work and you hope that the machine won't make a loud noise.

A hiss followed by a spray on your face. It tasted tangy and icky. Then suddenly, you could feel yourself being ripped out of your body and fitted into a small container. A hiss went by again and the pods opened. You feel disoriented and the world around you wobbled. Everything looks bigger than they were before and the sudden change of your perspective adds salt to the wound.

"Jake? Yo-" You noticed the change of your voice. High pitched with signs of growing puberty. "You alright?" The smoke cleared out and you saw your body. It looked wrong, unsymmetrical and weird. But deep inside, you know that it is your body.

"Yeah, I'm good." He looked at his new body and touched all over it. "I'm tall and I'm a teenager! Fuck it Bro, it fucking worked! Now I could drink beer legally."

"Right right, just don't over do it. I don't want to come back to my body deep in hang over."

He went back up, while you closed down the hatch, concealing the machine.

Now, what will you do for the rest of the day.
113.title: Being the middle child

choices: pretend to be timmy and hang out with one of his friends
114.content:
Timmy would be perfect, he is only 12, and doesn't have that many responsibilities. Plus you two had an awesome relationship, and would both have a blast as each other for a while. You walk into your living room and see him sitting on the couch watching T.V. "Hey John what’s up?" he says as soon as he sees you. "Nothing' much I guess, but anyway, I found this weird machine in the basement and I think it would be fun to try it out." You say casually. "Do you know what it does?" He asks. "Well it switches people’s bodies, and I thought it would be fun to switch bodies with each other." You say. You know your brother is way into this stuff so his automatic answer is yes. "Sweet, that’s awesome." He says as he jumps up. "But I don't understand one thing." "What?" You ask. "Why would you want to switch bodies with me instead of dad or Jake." he asked as you two walk down the stairs of the basement. "I kind of want to be younger." You say as you walk up to the machine.
Timmy is completely amazed by it. "Wow, how does it work?" he asks as he walks around it. "Well first you get into one of the pods, and then I get into the other, after that I just press the button, and we switch bodies." You say as you look behind you for Timmy. He's already in one of the pods, waiting for you to get in the other. "I guess you're ready huh." You say as you get in the other pod. "Alright Timmy get ready to be me." You say as you press the button in between the pods.
Everything goes black for a second, and you feel yourself being sucked from your body and being shoved into one that is too small for you. When you open the door, you notice that everything is bigger that it was before. You walk to the mirror that your parents put down there when they had their work out phase, and saw your 12 year old brother Timmy’s face staring back at you. “Holy shit it actually worked.” You say in your brother’s voice. “Holy Crap this is weird.” You hear you voice from behind you. “Thanks for switching with me Timmy.” You say. “You’re welcome. I guess.” He says as he goes over to the mirror. “So how long do you want to be me?” Timmy asked. “For the rest of the weekend.” You say. It’s Friday, so that will work out very nicely. “That’s good with me.” Timmy says as he heads up the basement stairs. You head up stairs too. You go to your new room and look around. There are Pokemon posters everywhere. “I didn’t know he was that into that stuff.” You say as you go and lie down on your new bed. You lied down on your bed and decide to…

Your best friend Tyler (11) walks in quietly.
Mom walks in and watches you, and starts touching herself.

As you are getting really into it, Tim's penis is hard as iron and the feeling is just awesome, you feel yourself building up to a huge climax when in walks ...........

12.content: You have a good group of friends,but to make it simpler which Sex would you want to swap into first?
12.title: Friends

121.content:
Thinking of the possibilities with this machine is nearly infinite. I could swap with the president or some rich guy. But first time using it should be precautionary.

Narrowing down the criteria for your Guinea pig would be best, for now. Someone near and accessible. And someone that doesn't remove your manhood. By far, you are the friendliest guy in the school. You have many friends from outside and inside the four corners of your room. Despite not being cool or handsome, they still made friends with you. Even the bullies are friends with you. Still, they bully you though. In a lesser extent anyway.

Thinking hard and long, you narrowed a list of people that satiate your criteria.
121.title: The Boy's

1213.content: Those are not your only two friends. You still got a few more. Here are the rest of them.
1213.title: Others

122.title: The Girl's

14.content: You think that it might be fun to ba a dog (Atleast for a while) and you might get a new perspective on life. The only thing now was to decide which dog to switch with...
14.title: Dogs

choices: Go to your mom for breakfast and to use the rest room
Go and sit with Timmy and watch tv
Explore the house from a dogs perspective
142.content:
Sparky would be the best choice. He was young and strong, and you thought pit bulls looked awesome. Sparky was completely Black with a white diamond on his head. You go up stairs and look around for him. You find him sleeping on his dog bed in the living room. "Hey sparky you wanna go outside?" You ask. He immediately jumps up and runs to you. "Come on buddy." You say as you walk towards the basement. He runs in front of you and beats you down the stairs. "I hope i have that much energy when I’m that body." You say as you walk down the stairs. You walk over to one of the pods and open the door. "Come on sparky." You say as you point to the pod. He jumps in and you close the door...but not all the way, how would you get out? You walk over to the other pod and get in. you close the door and press the blue button on the inside of the door. Then everything goes black.

When you wake up, and look around, everything is huge. You try to move your arms to open the pod, but notice they don't move that way. You look down and see two black paws where your hands should be. "It worked!" You try to say, but all that comes out is "Bark Bark!" Then Sparky in your old body comes and opens the door to the other pod. "Alright sparky do you want to go out side?" He asks. "I guess when I switch with an animal, they think they're me." You think as you jump from the pod. "Wow I feel so strong." You think as you run in front of your old body and bolt towards the back door. You try to open the door, but you remember that you're a dog now, and have to wait for sparky in your old body to open the door. He quickly come to the door and opens it. You bolt out side and start to run around in circles. "Wow I have so much energy." You say as you slow down and walk over to the tree in your back yard. You sit down in a nice shady place, and slowly fall asleep.

When you wake up, you look around and see that it's dark out. "Did I really sleep for that long?" You think as you walk up to the back door of your house. When nobody comes after a while, you start to bark. You hear foot steps from the other side and the door opens to reveal your mother. "Hey sparky." she says as she lets you into the house. You walk to the living room and go you new bad and lie down there. "Maybe a dogs life isn't so bad." You think as you lay your head down on your paws. "Maybe I'll stay this way for more than a day, which is almost over anyway." You look around and see that sparky in your old body is sitting on the couch watching tv. You walk over to him, jump up on the couch, and lie down you your old lap like sparky used to do to you. sparky in your old body pats you on the head and you slowly fall asleep. When you wake up you look at the clock above the mantle place in the living room and see that it is eight o'clock in the morning on a saturday. Your old body wouldn't be awake yet so switching back wasn't possible (for right now atleast), but you hear your mom in the kitchen and your brother Timmy is awake and watching tv. You decide to...
142.title: Sparky (3 year old Male) Pit bull

info.brief_description: Your name is John, you are 18 and find a body swap maching, what will happen next.
info.description:
Your name is John, you are 18 and you are a semi-popular senior who is a little bored with his life. you find a body swap machine and things start to get a little crazy. When you switch bodies with somebody, you have to stay in their nody for atleast twenty four hours. Sex and Nudity is okay. no lesbain stuff, there are PLENTY of stories with that in it and i dont mind it, but i want something different.
